Name: 3dSen VR
About the game: 3dSen VR a unique emulator that magically converts your favorite NES games into 3D & allows you to play it in VR! Warning For non-VR user please check 3dSen PC instead Trailer doesn't do it justice, you must try the demo to truly feel how immersive and refreshing the experience is. Highlight Features Ever growing list of 3D supported games Support playing in both VR and Desktop modes Zero Input Lag & Zero motion sickness 6 Degree of Freedom Zapper/ Light Gun support User friendly VR UI with both Laser Beam and Gaze control methods Normal & Motion Controllers Native SteamVR and Oculus Runtime support Dynamic Skyboxes 2D Mode Save States Notes WMR user: use Room Scale mode to have perfect experience Acknowledgement: I'm very grateful to have Morphcat Games â€™s permission to use their game Micro Mages as marketing materials
